description:
It`s been a while since dad has been home. He mentions how girls are better since Fumi is emotionally attached while Bunji is a bit hurt; Dad went barhopping while Bunji went to friend`s after friend`s house. Mom lectured them respectively; Bunji`s teacher complimented his artwork despite his lack of talent which mom learns from; Dad made some time and played with the kids as much as possible. They sat on his lap while watching TV. Mom was earnestly looking from behind which reminded her of her own dad.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Lucky? / Be alike? / Find a way to praise them? / Look at the back
ツイてる? / 似てる? / ほめどころ? / うしろ姿
